EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for submitting your account registration for Honeywell Forge Connected Engines
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Honeywell Forge Customer,
Thank you for submitting your account registration for Honeywell Forge Connected Engines Services. We are pleased to have you on the Honeywell Forge Platform.
Before we process your registration, please complete the following actions to initialize the engine data validation feature on your account.
REQUIRED ACTIONS:
- Complete ECFR download on your registered Aircraft Tail Number using the new EEI for Forge (available here <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/secure/downloads/software-downloads]]>). Refer to the EEI for Forge User’s Guide, also available on prior link, for guidance. - Reply to this email attaching the ECFR download (.gz format) that was saved in your EEI for Forge “Downloads” folder.
The activation of your account and aircraft in Forge may take up to three business days to complete. A confirmation email will be sent to you when your account has been successfully activated.
Thank you for your patience,
Honeywell Forge
